p: The intensive use of antibiotics and fungicides causes microorganisms to develop defenses which then result in resistance to drugs, thus limiting the treatment options against infections (Varaldo 2002). The swift evolution of resistance to antimicrobials and the lack of discovery of new drugs have motivated the search for alternatives, such as multidrug treatment approaches (Keith et al. 2005). Studies from various authors have shown that species of the Croton genus have antimicrobial activity against diverse species of bacteria and fungi, in addition to a modulatory activity of antibacterial and antifungal drugs (Costa et al. 2008; López 2010; Nader 2010).
